title: The potential of construction robotics to reduce airborne virus transmission in the construction industry in the UK and China
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Lutong Li, Pu Yuan, Yuan Tang, Glen Cooper, Simon Thurlbeck, Clara Man Cheung, Patrick Manu, Akilu Yunusa-Kaltungo, Andrew Weightman
